creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: woman wearing white apron and cap, holding jug in her PR hand, emerging from a doorway; tub to left of doorway on floor; shelf above doorway with bottles and tankard; arched doorway into another room at left
inscription:
Title and Inscription

LLC, printed in black: [Bonvin, pix. et sc.]; LRC, printed in black: [A. Cadart, Edit. Imp. 56, Bard Haussmann, Paris.]
signed: bottom center, printed in black: [LA SORTIE DE CAVE.]
title: La Sortie de Cave
